unnormalised: New community center to be inaugurated at 123 Gandhi Nagar, Delhi, 110031. The space, meant for public gatherings and events, is expected to host functions for residents of the locality, and is conveniently located next to the popular 'Apna Bazaar' market. The address is crucial for attendees - note that parking is available at the adjacent municipal ground, accessible via Subhash Marg, just off 123 Gandhi Nagar.
normalised: new community center to be inaugurated at one hundred and twenty three Gandhi Nagar, Delhi, one hundred and ten thousand and thirty one. the space, meant for public gatherings and events, is expected to host functions for residents of the locality, and is conveniently located next to the popular 'Apna Bazaar' market. the address is crucial for attendees - note that parking is available at the adjacent municipal ground, accessible via Subhash Marg, just off one hundred and twenty three Gandhi Nagar.

unnormalised: The local councillor, Mr. R.K. Sharma, announced that the inaugural event is scheduled for 20/07/2024 at 10:00 AM. Residents are encouraged to RSVP by 15/07/2024 to ensure adequate seating. Contact the registration desk at the old Panchayat office located at 45, Nehru Enclave, Delhi, 110032, or call 011-26XXXXXX for any address-related queries or further information.
normalised: the local councillor, Mister R-K Sharma, announced that the inaugural event is scheduled for twentieth july two thousand and twenty four at ten A-M. residents are encouraged to R-S-V-P by fifteenth july two thousand and twenty four to ensure adequate seating. contact the registration desk at the old Panchayat office located at forty five, Nehru Enclave, Delhi, one hundred and ten thousand and thirty two, or call zero double one-two six X-X-X-X-X-X for any address-related queries or further information.

unnormalised: The venue has two halls, one large one at Plot No. 5A and a smaller one at Building 2B, each accommodating roughly 200 and 50 people respectively. This difference allows for flexible usage for various groups. The center's precise location on Google Maps can be found searching for "Gandhi Nagar Community Centre, Near Apna Bazaar, Delhi, 110031."
normalised: the venue has two halls, one large one at Plot Number five A and a smaller one at Building two B, each accommodating roughly two hundred and fifty people respectively. this difference allows for flexible usage for various groups. the center's precise location on Google Maps can be found searching for "Gandhi Nagar Community Centre, Near Apna Bazaar, Delhi, one hundred and ten thousand and thirty one."
